title: Use h3 for references title
description: Change bibliography HTML to render the References title as an h3 instead of a paragraph.

description: Eliminate the ordered list of recent articles from the UI so no article list is rendered.

title: Remove unused class attributes in index.html
description: Strip class attributes from index.html when the class names are not defined in classless-1.1-mod.css.

title: Split interests into module
description: Move the interests array into interests.js and import it from script.js; load script.js as a module.

title: Implement PubMed search + GPT summaries
description: In script.js, embed interests list, randomly pick 3 entries, fetch last 10 PubMed items per query (ESearch + EFetch) like prior_examples/index.html, then call OpenAI Responses API to generate summary HTML per topic/journal using prompt logic from prior_examples/pubmed_topic_rss_minimal.py. No rss.xml output.

title: Build classless UI + key storage + favicon
description: Create index.html and rendering layout styled like prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news (classless CSS). Use same URL param + localStorage pattern for the GPT API key. Use favicon.ico from prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news. Render summaries similar to prior_examples/rss2html_userscript.js with article lists and links.

title: Remove recent articles fallback text
description: Delete the fallback text 'Recent articles' from appendMissingPmids in script.js.

title: Remove inline styles from index.html
description: Delete the inline <style> block so only the classless-1.1-mod.css stylesheet is used.

title: Single-page PubMed interests dashboard
description: Build a single-page app with just index.html and script.js (interests.json embedded). On load, pick 3 random interests and fetch last 10 PubMed articles per query, then generate GPT summaries per topic/journal like prior_examples/pubmed_topic_rss_minimal.py and render like prior_examples/rss2html_userscript.js without creating rss.xml. Vanilla JS only. Use classless styling like prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news. Use same URL param + localStorage setup for GPT API key and reuse favicon.ico from prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news.

description: Reference classless-1.1-mod.css from index.html and include the stylesheet file for the single-page app.

title: Adjust prompt and layout for summaries
